biotools.summary: TRIFID is an ML-based tool trained on the evidence of large-scale proteomics analysis and evolutionary, structural, annotation, splicing, and RNA-seq based features to classify the biologically important splice isoforms.

bioschemas.name: TRIFID
bioschemas.summary: TRIFID is an ML-based tool trained on the evidence of large-scale proteomics analysis and evolutionary, structural, annotation, splicing, and RNA-seq based features to classify the biologically important splice isoforms.
